name: Carey Token
description:
CAREY is presented as a project with the ambition to grow within the crypto world and with the intention of being a reference in its goal: to collaborate and help the world, to make it a better place for everyone.

This is why all transactions made will have a commission of 0.1%, which will go to a single, fully public and audited wallet. This wallet will be used to make donations to non-profit organizations around the world, thus collaborating among all of us who use CAREY to create a better place to live.

In addition, CAREY will begin an audit process to ensure the stability and transparency of the ecosystem we want to create. The wallet where all these commissions will be received will be fully transparent and will publish and update every donation made, being the maximum responsible the creator of the token, who will guarantee the correct functioning of the capital flow that arrives to the wallet.
